books.title: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
books.description: The first book in Harry Potter series, following the young wizard Harry Potter and his friends as they attend Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.
books.author: J.K. Rowling

books.title: The Little Prince
books.description: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry's classic novella about a young prince who travels to different planets, learning important life lessons along the way.
books.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

books.title: The Hobbit
books.description: J.R.R. Tolkien's fantasy novel about the hobbit Bilbo Baggins, who embarks on a quest to reclaim the treasure guarded by the dragon Smaug.
books.author: J.R.R. Tolkien

books.title: The Great Gatsby
books.description: F. Scott Fitzgerald's novel set during the Roaring Twenties, a tale of love, wealth, and the American Dream.
books.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

books.title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows
books.description: The seventh and final book in Harry Potter series, following Harry Potter's final confrontation with the dark wizard Voldemort.
books.author: J.K. Rowling
